name: Dewsbury and District Ramblers Centenary Walk

ai.summary: A short, easy 2.9 km walk organized by the Dewsbury and District Ramblers to celebrate their centenary. The route is suitable for most ages and abilities and offers a relaxed stroll that highlights local scenery in the UK.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat with a mix of paved paths, compact gravel, and short grassy sections. Expect gentle gradients and well-marked routes typical of UK rambler walks.
ai.safety_notes: Check weather and foot conditions before you go. Wear sturdy, comfortable footwear and clothing suitable for changing conditions. Bring water, a small snack, and a map or smartphone with a charging option. Tell someone your route and take care near road junctions and any uneven surfaces.
recommended_gear: Layered clothing and a light rain jacket
Map, GPS, or a charged phone with offline map
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly March–October) offers milder weather and clearer paths; the walk can be enjoyed in winter, but conditions may be wetter and muddier.

seo.title: Dewsbury and District Ramblers Centenary Walk – Easy 2.9 km in the UK
seo.meta_description: Enjoy an easy 2.9 km Ramblers walk in the UK. Great for beginners and families, with gentle terrain and a relaxed pace.
seo.h1: Dewsbury and District Ramblers Centenary Walk – 2.9 km Easy
